column1: '''The Shadow Of The Past''' is the third track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].  It begins slightly wistful and dark
column2: with the melody played by the oboe
column3: and strings in the background.  Suddenly
column4: the song breaks into the 5/5 [[Isengard]] theme
column5: followed by a loud chorus with the theme of the [[Nazg√ªl|Black Riders]].  The brass and drums take over as it quiets down
column6: then shifting back to quieter oboe and low brass
column7: playing the Prophecy theme.  It crescendos again
column8: but quickly after decrescendos into a quiet theme played by the strings and brass.  It ends with the brass crescendoing and moving.
